objective:
I am Johannes, a passionate software developer and engineer. After my dual studies at [Example Company GmbH](https://www.example.com/), I am currently doing my Master's in Software Engineering in Konstanz, DE. In addition, I work as a freelance developer and consultant for various companies and realize my own side projects in my favorite topics, full-stack development and software architecture.

Currently, I'm developing a resume generator, which is used to generate this resume.

education.thesis: Here should stand the title of the bachelor thesis

entities: Leadership Qualities ('You take on a very central role in planning and team communication')
Customer Orientation ('Your comprehensible and positive interaction with the CPOs is striking in a positive sense')
Communication Skills ('You communicate with great commitment and authenticity')

infos: Visited all IT departments of the company
Stay abroad to work in a Example subsidiary in Italy for several months
Worked on real projects in an international business environment
Among others, worked for XXX and YYY.

projects.name: Resume All in One
projects.description: A web application to generate a web resume as well as a printable PDF version from a JSON file. This resume is generated using this application. Technologies used: Next.js, Aceternity UI and LaTeX.

projects.name: Reveal the World: Cloud Native Travel Map App
projects.description: A Web-App with Kubernetes, Terraform, Express, Vue and Leaflet made for running on Azure

projects.name: User Authentication using Voice Recognition
projects.description: A student research project concerning the topic of user authentication using voice recognition.
